thread.title: Tomi Lahren and Doc Thompson Announce Hollywood-Mocking ‘Snowflake Awards’
thread.title_full: Tomi Lahren and Doc Thompson Announce Hollywood-Mocking ‘Snowflake Awards’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Tomi Lahren and Doc Thompson Announce Hollywood-Mocking ‘Snowflake Awards’
text:
Tomi Lahren and Doc Thompson Announce Hollywood-Mocking ‘Snowflake Awards’ by Josh Feldman | 9:03 pm, February 9th, 2017 
The Blaze’s Tomi Lahren and Doc Thompson tonight announced an Oscar-parodying, Hollywood-mocking “Snowflake Awards” ceremony. 
If you have been on the internet at all in the last few months, you’re probably aware that some conservatives have started using “snowflake” as a pejorative to describe overly sensitive, politically-correct liberals. 
The website for this awards ceremony, which will be broadcast on February 26th (the same night as the Oscars), explains, “The Snowflake Awards was established to honor notable hypersensitive citizens, those who, when subjected to the slightest pressures of life, begin to melt!” 
Below you can see the award categories and nominees: 
BEST SNOWFLAKE
